price: يقيناً الله ته هغه څه ښه معلوم دي چې هغوى يې له الله پرته رابولي او همغه برلاسى حكمت والا دى.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مِن شَيۡءٖۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha yaʿlamu mā yadʿūna min dūnihi min shayin wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
